【江峰時刻】《川普對決中國》：方偉採訪美國重量級政治人物金里奇（Gingrich）談中共四十七年（尼克松毛澤東時代開始）一貫欺騙與美國的覺醒

04 Nov 2019, 20:28

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月05日訊】《川普對決中國》：方偉採訪美國重量級政治人物金里奇（Gingrich）談中共四十七年（尼克松毛澤東時代開始）一貫欺騙與美國的覺醒（江峰會客室20191101第3期）



本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/04/a102700010.html
text:
[Jiangfeng Moment] "Tuanpu vs. China": Fang Wei interviewed Gingrich, a US heavyweight political figure, about the CCP’s forty-seven years (the beginning of the Nixon Mao Zedong era) and the deception of the United States

04 Nov 2019, 20:28

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 05, 2019] "Tuanpu vs. China": Fang Wei interviewed Gingrich, a US heavyweight politician, about the CCP’s forty-seven years (beginning of the Nixon Mao Zedong era) Awakening (Jiangfeng Meeting Room 20191101, Issue 3)
